definitions.definition: Partially or mostly burnt material that results from incomplete combustion of coal or wood etc.; it often rides the rising smoke column into the air, and it can pose a fire hazard when it lands, in dry conditions .
Any strong stimulant added to tea , soda water , etc.

main_definition: Partially or mostly burnt material that results from incomplete combustion of coal or wood etc.; it often rides the rising smoke column into the air, and it can pose a fire hazard when it lands, in dry conditions .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , colloquial ) Any strong stimulant added to tea , soda water , etc.
